general.thisResumeCanBeFound: This resume can be found here

graduation.title: Bachelor in Science of Software Engineering

postGraduation.title: Post-Graduation in Software Architecture and Software Engineering

qualifications.title: Qualifications
array: Over 7 years of proven experience in Java platform
Software testing with JUnit, AssertJ, Mockito, EasyMock, Selenium, Karma and Protractor.
Test coverage with Cobertura, JaCoCo and EMMA.
Front-end development with AngularJS, React, Bootstrap, jQuery and HTML5.
Spring Framework: Core, Data JPA, Boot, Integration, Batch, MVC and Spring Tool Suit (STS).
Eclipse IDE Galileo, Indigo, Juno, Kepler, Luna, Mars and Neon;
Jetbrains suite 13+: intelliJ IDEA, Webstorm, DataGrip and Toolbox.
XMPP with Openfire (server, both installation and configuration) and Smack (Java API).
XML, XSD, XSTL, OXM (JAXB, Apache XMLBeans, dom4j, w3c DOM).
Redmine: installation, set-up, training, maintenance and plug-ins.
Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint), OpenOffice, Google Apps and OneDrive.

events.title: External Activities, Events, Lectures etc
array: CBSoft: Brazilian Congress on Software - Maceió, Alagoas, Brazil - 2014.
Goiás' Software Engineering Journey (In Portuguese, Jornada Goiana em Engenharia de Software) – Goiânia, Goiás, Brazil - 2009, 2010, 2011, 2012 and 2014.
Qcon SP – São Paulo, São Paulo, Brazil - 2012 and 2013.
TDC Goiânia (Agile, entrepreneurship, tests and Java tracks) – Goiânia, Goiás, Brazil - 2011 and 2012.
Flisol – Latin American Free Software Install Fest (In Portuguese, Fórum Latino-Americano de Instalação de Software Livre) – Goiânia, Goiás, Brazil - 2010.
FGSL: Goiás' Free Software Forum (In Portuguese, Fórum Goiano de Software Livre) – Goiânia, Goiás, Brazil - 2009.
